metadata.title: CVE-2021-3903 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-common - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
xxd - 2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3565-1ubuntu2').
